quoted.text:
howdy i'm kai - i'm a product designer that has been coding curious for more than a decade

i've decided to take my learning journey more seriously and share what i'm picking up along the way. 

cheers to learning, growing, thriving, vibing! https://t.co/FNbEpZdDB9
